titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: Beeching & his daughters left by the 8.20 a.m. At 2 p.m. I attended the Convocation in the Castle Hall, and was presented by Cruickshank for a Master's degree. This is designed to give me a vote in Convocation. Later in the day, Cruickshank came to bid me farewell, as he will go south for the vacation.
